#include<iostream>

#include<cmath>
#define  s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
using namespace std;

#define ull unsigned long long int

ull power(ull x,ull y)
{
    ull temp;
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    temp = power(x, y/2);
    if (y%2 == 0)
        return temp*temp;
    else
        return x*temp*temp;
}

int mod(int a)
{
    if(a<0)
    return -a;
    else
    return a;
}
